title: Resisting the Teaching
summary: Evan on cosmic trolley witnesses clouds of human suffering he cannot help, while in hypnosis his thought bubble shows multiple selves failing to prevent pain, learning the hard lesson of witnessing without fixing.
narrative_function: Critical lesson about limits of helping, Evan learns to witness suffering without being destroyed by inability to fix it

character_development.Evan: Faces hardest teaching - cannot prevent all suffering, must learn to witness with compassion
character_development.Multiple Evans: Different aspects trying and failing to fix everything

panel_contrast.panel_1: Cosmic scope of suffering and helplessness
panel_contrast.panel_2: Internal struggle between helping impulse and acceptance
